mapper.select:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-selectOneBoardBultClsfNornSno */
SELECT #{bultClsfDvsnVl} || LPAD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NVL(MAX(BULT_CLSF_ID), '000000000'), 2, 9)) +1, 9, '0') AS BULT_CLSF_ID , '' AS AFI_SRCH_DVSN_VL , '' AS AFI_FOLW_EXCF_NM , '' AS PART_PBNT_YN , '' AS DPRT_FOCL_ID , '' AS UPDT_YN , '' AS WRTG_ATHR_YN FROM CUBLBRCMT /* 게시판분류관리_T */ WHERE SUBSTR(BULT_CLSF_ID, 1, 1) = #{bultClsfDvsnVl} AND BULT_CLSF_DVSN_VL = #{bultClsfDvsnVl}

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-listBoardBultClsfSelect */
select cmt.bult_clsf_id as bult_clsf_id -- 게시분류ID , cmt.hgrn_bult_clsf_id as hgrn_bult_clsf_id -- 상위게시분류ID , cmt.bult_clsf_nm as bult_clsf_nm -- 게시분류명 , cmt.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl as bult_clsf_dvsn_vl -- 게시분류구분값 , cmt.smcl_typ_vl as smcl_typ_vl -- 소분류타입값 , cmt.dltn_yn as dltn_yn -- 삭제여부 , cmt.bult_scrn_id as bult_scrn_id -- 게시화면ID , cmt.bult_imag_nm as bult_imag_nm -- 게시이미지명 , cmt.bult_url_nm as bult_url_nm -- 게시URL명 , cmt.bult_srvc_id as bult_srvc_id -- 게시서비스ID , cmt.bult_all_pbnt_yn as bult_all_pbnt_yn -- 게시전체공지여부 , nvl ( cmt.scrn_dspl_sqnc , 0 ) as scrn_dspl_sqnc -- 화면표시순서 , cmt.prmt_tart_nm as prmt_tart_nm -- 파라미터Target명 , fmt.file_id as file_id -- 파일ID , decode ( nvl ( cmt.mm_bsis_bult_perd , 0 ) , 0 , 1 , cmt.mm_bsis_bult_perd ) as mm_bsis_bult_perd -- 월기본게시기간 , decode ( nvl ( cmt.mm_mxmm_bult_perd , 0 ) , 0 , 999 , cmt.mm_mxmm_bult_perd ) as mm_mxmm_bult_perd -- 월최대게시기간 , nvl ( cmt.mult_hspt_psbl_yn , 'N' ) as mult_hspt_psbl_yn -- 멀티병원가능여부 , cmt.bsis_bult_clsf_cd as bsis_bult_clsf_cd -- 기본게시분류코드 , fn_cu_bult_get_wrtg_athr ( cmt.bult_clsf_id , cmt.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl , #{lginId} , #{hsptCd} , #{hgrnClsfCdNm} ) as rgst_yn -- [ 게시분류별 작성권한 여부 ] 등록여부 , fn_cu_bult_get_atfl_size ( cmt.bult_clsf_id , cmt.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl , #{lginId} , #{hsptCd} , #{vlmVl} ) as rtur_vl -- [ 게시분류별 첨부파일 제한용량 ] 첨부파일용량 from cublbrcmt cmt -- 게시판분류관리_T , cublbrfmt fmt -- 게시판첨부파일_T where cmt.dltn_yn = 'N' -- 삭제가 않된 항목 and cmt.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl in ( 'L' -- 대분류 , 'M' -- 중분류 ) and fn_cu_bult_get_list_athr ( cmt.bult_clsf_id , cmt.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl , #{lginId} , #{hsptCd} ) = 'Y' -- 게시분류 목록 조회여부Func and fmt.bult_id (+) = cmt.bult_clsf_id and fmt.dltn_yn (+) = 'N' and fmt.atfl_typ_cd (+) = 'MDCS_IMAGE' -- 게시판관리용 이미지 order by cmt.hgrn_bult_clsf_id , nvl ( cmt.scrn_dspl_sqnc , 0 ) -- 정렬순서_상위게시분류ID_화면표시순서 , cmt.bult_clsf_id
mapper.insert:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-insertBoardBultClsf */
insert into cublbrcmt -- 게시판분류관리_T ( bult_clsf_id -- 게시분류ID , hgrn_bult_clsf_id -- 상위게시분류ID , bult_clsf_nm -- 게시분류명 , bult_clsf_dvsn_vl -- 게시분류구분값 , smcl_typ_vl -- 소분류타입값 , dltn_yn -- 삭제여부 , bult_scrn_id -- 게시화면ID , bult_imag_nm -- 게시이미지명 , bult_url_nm -- 게시URL명 , bult_srvc_id -- 게시서비스ID , bult_all_pbnt_yn -- 게시전체공지여부 , scrn_dspl_sqnc -- 화면표시순서 , prmt_tart_nm -- 파라미터Target명 , frst_rgsr_id , frst_rgst_ip , frst_rgst_dt , frst_rgst_clnt_prgm_id , frst_rgst_srvr_prgm_id , last_updr_id , last_updt_ip , last_updt_dt , last_updt_clnt_prgm_id , last_updt_srvr_prgm_id , mm_bsis_bult_perd , mm_mxmm_bult_perd , mult_hspt_psbl_yn , bsis_bult_clsf_cd ) values ( #{bultClsfId} -- 게시분류ID , #{hgrnBultClsfId} -- 상위게시분류ID , #{bultClsfNm} -- 게시분류명 , #{bultClsfDvsnVl} -- 게시분류구분값 , #{smclTypVl} -- 소분류타입값 , #{dltnYn} -- 삭제여부 , #{bultScrnId} -- 게시화면ID , #{bultImagNm} -- 게시이미지명 , #{bultUrlNm} -- 게시URL명 , #{bultSrvcId} -- 게시서비스ID , #{bultAllPbntYn} -- 게시전체공지여부 , #{scrnDsplSqnc} -- 화면표시순서 , #{prmtTartNm} -- 파라미터Target명 , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , decode ( nvl ( #{mmBsisBultPerd} , 0 ) , 0 , 1 , #{mmBsisBultPerd} ) , decode ( nvl ( #{mmMxmmBultPerd} , 0 ) , 0 , 999 , #{mmMxmmBultPerd} ) , nvl ( #{multHsptPsblYn} , 'N' ) , nvl ( #{bsisBultClsfCd} , 'GNR' ) )
mapper.update:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-updateBoardBultClsf */
update cublbrcmt -- 게시판분류관리_T set bult_clsf_nm = #{bultClsfNm} -- 게시분류명 , bult_clsf_dvsn_vl = #{bultClsfDvsnVl} -- 게시분류구분값 , smcl_typ_vl = #{smclTypVl} -- 소분류타입값 , dltn_yn = #{dltnYn} -- 삭제여부 , bult_scrn_id = #{bultScrnId} -- 게시화면ID , bult_imag_nm = #{bultImagNm} -- 게시이미지명 , bult_url_nm = #{bultUrlNm} -- 게시URL명 , bult_srvc_id = #{bultSrvcId} -- 게시서비스ID , bult_all_pbnt_yn = #{bultAllPbntYn} -- 게시전체공지여부 , prmt_tart_nm = #{prmtTartNm} -- 파라미터Target명 , last_updr_id = #{gvUserId} , last_updt_ip = #{gvUserIp} , last_updt_dt = sysdate , last_updt_clnt_prgm_id = #{gvClntPrgmId} , last_updt_srvr_prgm_id = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , mm_bsis_bult_perd = decode ( nvl ( #{mmBsisBultPerd} , 0 ) , 0 , mm_bsis_bult_perd , #{mmBsisBultPerd} ) , mm_mxmm_bult_perd = decode ( nvl ( #{mmMxmmBultPerd} , 0 ) , 0 , mm_mxmm_bult_perd , #{mmMxmmBultPerd} ) , mult_hspt_psbl_yn = nvl ( #{multHsptPsblYn} , mult_hspt_psbl_yn ) , bsis_bult_clsf_cd = nvl ( #{bsisBultClsfCd} , bsis_bult_clsf_cd ) where bult_clsf_id = #{bultClsfId} -- 게시분류ID and dltn_yn = #{dltnYn} -- 삭제여부
mapper.delete:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-deleteBoardBultClsf */
UPDATE CUBLBRCMT /* 게시판분류관리_T */ SET DLTN_YN = #{dltnYn} /* 삭제여부 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} /* 게시분류ID */
mapper.select:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-listBoardBultClsfSmclDetlSelect */
select a.bult_clsf_id as bult_clsf_id -- 게시분류ID , a.hgrn_bult_clsf_id as hgrn_bult_clsf_id -- 상위게시분류ID , a.bult_clsf_nm as bult_clsf_nm -- 게시분류명 , a.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl as bult_clsf_dvsn_vl -- 게시분류구분값 , a.smcl_typ_vl as smcl_typ_vl -- 소분류타입값 , a.dltn_yn as dltn_yn -- 삭제여부 , a.bult_scrn_id as bult_scrn_id -- 게시화면ID , a.bult_imag_nm as bult_imag_nm -- 게시이미지명 , a.bult_url_nm as bult_url_nm -- 게시URL명 , a.bult_srvc_id as bult_srvc_id -- 게시서비스ID , a.scrn_dspl_sqnc as scrn_dspl_sqnc -- 화면표시순서 , a.bult_all_pbnt_yn as bult_all_pbnt_yn -- 게시전체공지여부 , decode ( nvl ( a.mm_bsis_bult_perd , 0 ) , 0 , 1 , a.mm_bsis_bult_perd ) as mm_bsis_bult_perd -- 월기본게시기간 , decode ( nvl ( a.mm_mxmm_bult_perd , 0 ) , 0 , 999 , a.mm_mxmm_bult_perd ) as mm_mxmm_bult_perd -- 월최대게시기간 , nvl ( a.mult_hspt_psbl_yn , 'N' ) as mult_hspt_psbl_yn -- 멀티병원가능여부 , a.bsis_bult_clsf_cd as bsis_bult_clsf_cd -- 기본게시분류코드 , fn_cu_bult_get_wrtg_athr ( a.bult_clsf_id , a.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl , #{lginId} , #{hsptCd} , #{hgrnClsfCdNm} ) as rgst_yn -- [ 게시분류별 작성권한 여부 ] 등록여부(소분류일 경우에는 중분류의 등록여부가 온다.) , fn_cu_bult_get_atfl_size ( a.bult_clsf_id , a.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl , #{lginId} , #{hsptCd} , #{vlmVl} ) as rtur_vl -- [ 게시분류별 첨부파일 제한용량 ] 첨부파일용량(소분류일 경우 중분류의 용량이 온다.) from cublbrcmt a -- 게시판분류관리 , ccenstimt b -- 공통환경설정항목 where a.hgrn_bult_clsf_id = nvl ( #{hgrnBultClsfId} , a.hgrn_bult_clsf_id ) -- 상위게시분류ID and a.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl = nvl ( #{bultClsfDvsnVl} , a.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl ) -- 개시분류구분값 and a.smcl_typ_vl = nvl ( #{smclTypVl} , a.smcl_typ_vl ) -- 소분류타입값 and a.dltn_yn = 'N' -- 삭제여부 and fn_cu_bult_get_list_athr ( a.bult_clsf_id , a.bult_clsf_dvsn_vl , #{lginId} , #{hsptCd} ) = 'Y' -- 게시분류 목록 조회여부Func and b.comn_envr_stup_grp_cd (+) = 'CUB_BOARD_DVSN' and b.comn_envr_stup_item_chrc_vl (+) = a.hgrn_bult_clsf_id order by decode ( b.comn_envr_stup_item_cd , '0005' , a.bult_clsf_nm , '' ) , a.scrn_dspl_sqnc , a.bult_clsf_id

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-selectOneBoardBultClsfMdcs */
SELECT A.BULT_CLSF_ID /* 게시분류ID */ , A.HGRN_BULT_CLSF_ID /* 상위게시분류ID */ , A.BULT_CLSF_NM /* 게시분류명 */ , A.BULT_CLSF_DVSN_VL /* 게시분류구분값 */ , A.SMCL_TYP_VL /* 소분류타입값 */ , A.DLTN_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , A.BULT_SCRN_ID /* 게시화면ID */ , A.BULT_IMAG_NM /* 게시이미지명 */ , A.BULT_URL_NM /* 게시URL명 */ , A.BULT_SRVC_ID /* 게시서비스ID */ FROM CUBLBRCMT A /* 게시판분류관리_T */ WHERE A.DLTN_YN = 'N'
AND A.BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} /* 게시분류ID */
AND A.HGRN_BULT_CLSF_ID = #{hgrnBultClsfId} /* 상위게시분류ID */
AND A.BULT_CLSF_DVSN_VL = #{bultClsfDvsnVl} /* 게시분류구분값 */
AND A.SMCL_TYP_VL = #{smclTypVl} /* 소분류타입값 */
ORDER BY HGRN_BULT_CLSF_ID, BULT_CLSF_ID

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-selectOneBoardBultClsfUseExistYn */
SELECT DECODE(COUNT(BULT_CLSF_ID), 0, 'N', 'Y') AS DLTN_YN -- N : 대상없음, Y : 대상있음. FROM CUBLBRCMT /* 게시판분류관리_T */ WHERE DLTN_YN = 'N' AND HGRN_BULT_CLSF_ID = #{hgrnBultClsfId} /* 상위분류코드ID */ AND BULT_CLSF_DVSN_VL = #{bultClsfDvsnVl} /* 게시분류구분값(L:대분류, M:중분류, S:소분류) */

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-selectOneBoardMngUseExistYn */
SELECT DECODE(COUNT(BULT_ID), 0, 'N', 'Y') AS DLTN_YN /* 게시물사용여부판별(N:사용않함, Y:사용함) */ FROM CUBLBRMMT /* 공통게시판_T */ WHERE DLTN_YN = 'N' /* 삭제여부 */ AND BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} /* 게시분류ID */

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-selectOneBoardMaxAttachImgId */
SELECT TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(ATFL_SNO), '0') +1) AS ATFL_SNO /* 첨부파일일련번호 */ FROM CUBLBRFMT /* 게시판첨부파일_T */ WHERE BULT_ID = #{bultId} /* 게시ID(중분류ID) */
mapper.update:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-updateBoardBultAttachImgMerge */
MERGE INTO CUBLBRFMT /* 게시판첨부파일 */ USING DUAL ON ( BULT_ID = #{bultId} /* 게시ID */ and ATFL_SNO = #{atflSno} /* 첨부파일일련번호 */ ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ATFL_TYP_CD = #{atflTypCd} /* 첨부유형코드 */ , FILE_ID = #{fileId} /* 파일ID */ , FILE_NM = #{fileNm} /* 파일명 */ , ATCH_FLDV_VL = #{atchFldvVl} /* 첨부파일구분값 */ , UUID = #{uuid} /* UUID 고유값 */ , FILE_SIZE_VL = #{fileSizeVl} /* 파일크기값 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE BULT_ID = #{bultId} /* 게시ID */ AND ATFL_SNO = #{atflSno} /* 첨부파일일련번호 */ WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( BULT_ID /* 게시ID */ , ATFL_SNO /* 첨부파일일련번호 */ , ATFL_TYP_CD /* 첨부유형코드 */ , FILE_ID /* 파일ID */ , FILE_NM /* 파일명 */ , ATCH_FLDV_VL /* 첨부파일구분값 */ , FILE_SIZE_VL /* 파일크기값 */ , UUID /* UUID 고유값 */ , FRST_RGSR_ID , FRST_RGST_IP , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID , FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDR_ID , LAST_UPDT_IP , LAST_UPDT_DT , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID ) VALUES ( #{bultId} /* 게시ID */ , #{atflSno} /* 첨부파일일련번호 */ , #{atflTypCd} /* 첨부유형코드 */ , #{fileId} /* 파일ID */ , #{fileNm} /* 파일명 */ , #{atchFldvVl} /* 첨부파일구분값 */ , #{fileSizeVl} /* 파일크기값 */ , #{uuid} /* UUID 고유값 */ , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} )
mapper.delete:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-deleteBoardBultAttachImg */
DELETE FROM CUBLBRFMT /* 게시판첨부파일_T */ WHERE BULT_ID = #{bultId} /* 게시ID */
AND ATFL_SNO = #{atflSno} /* 첨부파일일련번호 */
AND ATFL_TYP_CD = #{atflTypCd} /* 첨부유형코드 */
AND FILE_ID = #{fileId} /* 파일ID */
AND ATCH_FLDV_VL = #{atchFldvVl} /* 첨부파일구분값 */
DELETE /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-deleteBoardMngmAuthGrpWrtg */ FROM CUBLBRGMT /* 게시판작성권한조건그룹_T */ WHERE BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} /* 게시구분ID */
DELETE /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-deleteBoardMngmAuthSrchGrpWrtg */ FROM CUBLBRSMT /* 게시판작성조회권한조건그룹_T */ WHERE BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} /* 게시구분ID */
mapper.insert: INSERT /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-insertBoardMngmAuthGrpWrtg */ INTO CUBLBRGMT /* 게시판작성권한조건그룹_T */ ( BULT_CLSF_ID /* 게시분류ID */ , ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID /* 권한조건그룹ID */ , APST_DT /* 적용시작일시 */ , APFN_DT /* 적용종료일시 */ , ATHR_CNDT_GRP_APLY_SQNC /* 권한조건그룹적용순서 */ , ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM /* 권한조건그룹명 */ , ITEM_DVSN_CD /* 항목구분코드 */ , FRST_RGSR_ID , FRST_RGST_IP , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID , FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDR_ID , LAST_UPDT_IP , LAST_UPDT_DT , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID ) VALUES ( #{bultClsfId} /* 게시ID */ , #{athrCndtGrpId} /* 권한조건그룹ID */ , sysdate /* 적용시작일시 */ , to_date('2999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd') /* 적용종료일시 */ , #{athrCndtGrpAplySqnc} /* 권한조건그룹적용순서 */ , #{athrCndtGrpNm} /* 권한조건그룹명 */ , #{itemDvsnCd} /* 항목구분코드 : AT : ENABLED, BT : VISIBLED : default : BT */ , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} )

INSERT /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-insertBoardMngmAuthSrchGrpWrtg */ INTO CUBLBRSMT /* 게시판작성조회권한조건그룹_T */ ( BULT_CLSF_ID /* 게시분류ID */ , ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID /* 권한조건그룹ID */ , APST_DT /* 적용시작일시 */ , APFN_DT /* 적용종료일시 */ , ATHR_CNDT_GRP_APLY_SQNC /* 권한조건그룹적용순서 */ , ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM /* 권한조건그룹명 */ , ITEM_DVSN_CD /* 항목구분코드 */ , FRST_RGSR_ID , FRST_RGST_IP , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID , FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDR_ID , LAST_UPDT_IP , LAST_UPDT_DT , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID ) VALUES ( #{bultClsfId} /* 게시ID */ , #{athrCndtGrpId} /* 권한조건그룹ID */ , sysdate /* 적용시작일시 */ , to_date('2999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd') /* 적용종료일시 */ , #{athrCndtGrpAplySqnc} /* 권한조건그룹적용순서 */ , #{athrCndtGrpNm} /* 권한조건그룹명 */ , #{itemDvsnCd} /* 항목구분코드 : AT : ENABLED, BT : VISIBLED : default : BT */ , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} )
mapper.delete: DELETE /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-deleteBoardMngmAuthItemWrtg */ FROM CUBLBRIMT /* 게시판작성권한조건항목 */ WHERE BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} /* 게시분류ID */
DELETE /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-deleteBoardMngmAuthSrchItemWrtg */ FROM CUBLBRSIT /* 게시판작성조회권한조건항목 */ WHERE BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} /* 게시분류ID */
mapper.insert: INSERT /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-insertBoardMngmAuthItemWrtg */ INTO CUBLBRIMT /* 게시판작성권한조건항목_T */ ( BULT_CLSF_ID /* 게시ID */ , ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID /* 권한조건그룹ID */ , ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID /* 권한조건항목ID */ , APST_DT /* 적용시작일시 */ , APFN_DT /* 적용종료일시 */ , ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_SQNC /* 권한조건항목순서 */ , ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM /* 권한조건항목명 */ , CNDT_OPRR_CD /* 조건연산자코드 */ , CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL /* 조건대상항목값 */ , CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM /* 조건대상항목명 */ , CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD /* 조건대상항목코드 */ , FRST_RGSR_ID , FRST_RGST_IP , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID , FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDR_ID , LAST_UPDT_IP , LAST_UPDT_DT , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID ) VALUES ( #{bultClsfId} /* 게시ID */ , #{athrCndtGrpId} /* 권한조건그룹ID */ , #{athrCndtItemId} /* 권한조건항목ID */ , sysdate /* 적용시작일시 */ , to_date('2999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd') /* 적용종료일시 */ , #{athrCndtItemSqnc} /* 권한조건항목순서 */ , #{athrCndtItemNm} /* 권한조건항목명 */ , #{cndtOprrCd} /* 조건연산자코드 */ , #{cndtTrgtItemVl} /* 조건대상항목값 */ , #{cndtTrgtItemNm} /* 조건대상항목명 */ , #{cndtTrgtItemCd} /* 조건대상항목코드 */ , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} )

INSERT /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-insertBoardMngmAuthSrchItemWrtg */ INTO CUBLBRSIT /* 게시판작성조회권한조건항목_T */ ( BULT_CLSF_ID /* 게시ID */ , ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID /* 권한조건그룹ID */ , ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID /* 권한조건항목ID */ , APST_DT /* 적용시작일시 */ , APFN_DT /* 적용종료일시 */ , ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_SQNC /* 권한조건항목순서 */ , ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM /* 권한조건항목명 */ , CNDT_OPRR_CD /* 조건연산자코드 */ , CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL /* 조건대상항목값 */ , CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM /* 조건대상항목명 */ , CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD /* 조건대상항목코드 */ , FRST_RGSR_ID , FRST_RGST_IP , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID , FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDR_ID , LAST_UPDT_IP , LAST_UPDT_DT , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID ) VALUES ( #{bultClsfId} /* 게시ID */ , #{athrCndtGrpId} /* 권한조건그룹ID */ , #{athrCndtItemId} /* 권한조건항목ID */ , sysdate /* 적용시작일시 */ , to_date('2999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd') /* 적용종료일시 */ , #{athrCndtItemSqnc} /* 권한조건항목순서 */ , #{athrCndtItemNm} /* 권한조건항목명 */ , #{cndtOprrCd} /* 조건연산자코드 */ , #{cndtTrgtItemVl} /* 조건대상항목값 */ , #{cndtTrgtItemNm} /* 조건대상항목명 */ , #{cndtTrgtItemCd} /* 조건대상항목코드 */ , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} )
mapper.select:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-listSelBoardMngmAuthGrpWrtg */
SELECT MAIN.BULT_CLSF_ID AS MENU_ATHR_ID /* 게시분류ID */ , MAIN.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID /* 조건그룹ID */ , MAIN.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM /* 조건그룹명 */ , MAIN.ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID /* 조건항목ID */ , MAIN.ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM /* 조건항목명 */ , MAIN.CNDT_OPRR_CD AS CNDT_OPRR_CD /* 조건연산자코드 */ , MAIN.DETL_CD_NM AS COMN_CD_NM /* 조건연산자코드명 */ , MAIN.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD /* 조건대상항목코드 */ , MAIN.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL /* 조건대상항목값 */ , MAIN.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM /* 조건대상항목명 */ , MAIN.LV AS RTUR_VL /* 조건그룹, 조건항목 구분값 */ , MAIN.INQR_SQNC AS INQR_SQNC /* 표출순서 */ FROM ( SELECT ITEM.BULT_CLSF_ID AS BULT_CLSF_ID , ITEM.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID , '' AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM , ITEM.ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID , CSM003.DETL_CD_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM , ITEM.CNDT_OPRR_CD AS CNDT_OPRR_CD , CSM002.DETL_CD_NM AS DETL_CD_NM , ITEM.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD , ITEM.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL , ITEM.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM , '1' AS LV , ITEM.ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_SQNC AS INQR_SQNC FROM CUBLBRIMT ITEM /* 게시판작성권한조건항목_T */ , CCCMCDDMT CSM003 /* 조건대상항목코드_T */ , CCCMCDDMT CSM002 /* 조건연산자코드_T */ WHERE ITEM.BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} AND CSM003.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CSM_003' /* 조건대상항목코드 */ AND CSM003.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = ITEM.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD AND CSM002.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CSM_002' /* 조건연산자코드 */ AND CSM002.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = ITEM.CNDT_OPRR_CD UNION ALL SELECT GRP.BULT_CLSF_ID AS BULT_CLSF_ID , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM , '' AS CNDT_OPRR_CD , '' AS DETL_CD_NM , '' AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD , '' AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL , '' AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM , '0' AS LV , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_APLY_SQNC AS INQR_SQNC FROM CUBLBRGMT GRP /* 게시판작성권한조건그룹_T */ WHERE 'G' = substr(GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID, 1, 1) AND GRP.BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} ) MAIN ORDER BY MAIN.LV, MAIN.INQR_SQNC
mapper.update:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-updateBoardClsfScrnDsplSqnc */
UPDATE CUBLBRCMT /* 게시판분류관리_T */ SET SCRN_DSPL_SQNC = DECODE(#{scrnDsplSqnc}, 0, SCRN_DSPL_SQNC, #{scrnDsplSqnc}) , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} /* 게시분류ID */
mapper.select:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cu-ccu-dao-CcuBoardMngmDAO-listSelBoardMngmAuthGrpSrchWrtg */
SELECT MAIN.BULT_CLSF_ID AS MENU_ATHR_ID /* 게시분류ID */ , MAIN.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID /* 조건그룹ID */ , MAIN.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM /* 조건그룹명 */ , MAIN.ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID /* 조건항목ID */ , MAIN.ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM /* 조건항목명 */ , MAIN.CNDT_OPRR_CD AS CNDT_OPRR_CD /* 조건연산자코드 */ , MAIN.DETL_CD_NM AS COMN_CD_NM /* 조건연산자코드명 */ , MAIN.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD /* 조건대상항목코드 */ , MAIN.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL /* 조건대상항목값 */ , MAIN.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM /* 조건대상항목명 */ , MAIN.LV AS RTUR_VL /* 조건그룹, 조건항목 구분값 */ , MAIN.INQR_SQNC AS INQR_SQNC /* 표출순서 */ FROM ( SELECT ITEM.BULT_CLSF_ID AS BULT_CLSF_ID , ITEM.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID , '' AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM , ITEM.ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID , CSM003.DETL_CD_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM , ITEM.CNDT_OPRR_CD AS CNDT_OPRR_CD , CSM002.DETL_CD_NM AS DETL_CD_NM , ITEM.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD , ITEM.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL , ITEM.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM , '1' AS LV , ITEM.ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_SQNC AS INQR_SQNC FROM CUBLBRSIT ITEM /* 게시판작성조회권한조건항목_T */ , CCCMCDDMT CSM003 /* 조건대상항목코드_T */ , CCCMCDDMT CSM002 /* 조건연산자코드_T */ WHERE ITEM.BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} AND CSM003.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CSM_003' /* 조건대상항목코드 */ AND CSM003.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = ITEM.CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD AND CSM002.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CSM_002' /* 조건연산자코드 */ AND CSM002.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = ITEM.CNDT_OPRR_CD UNION ALL SELECT GRP.BULT_CLSF_ID AS BULT_CLSF_ID , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_ID , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_NM AS ATHR_CNDT_ITEM_NM , '' AS CNDT_OPRR_CD , '' AS DETL_CD_NM , '' AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_CD , '' AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_VL , '' AS CNDT_TRGT_ITEM_NM , '0' AS LV , GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_APLY_SQNC AS INQR_SQNC FROM CUBLBRSMT GRP /* 게시판작성조회권한조건그룹_T */ WHERE 'G' = substr(GRP.ATHR_CNDT_GRP_ID, 1, 1) AND GRP.BULT_CLSF_ID = #{bultClsfId} ) MAIN ORDER BY MAIN.LV, MAIN.INQR_SQNC
